statIntellect.name: Intellect
statIntellect.description:
Decreases the cooldown of your super ability.

Intellect can be increased by your Armor.

statDiscipline.name: Discipline
statDiscipline.description:
Discipline decreases the cooldown time of your grenades, allowing you to use them more often.

Find and equip armor with Discipline to boost this effect.

statStrength.name: Strength
statStrength.description:
Strength reduces the cooldown time of your melee ability, allowing you to use it more often.

Find and equip armor with Strength to boost this effect.

items.itemDescription: Harmony within, hurricane without.
~replicate~ devastate your foes ~consume~ Herja ~repeat
Eirene ~If (SIVA) return replicate // else if (!SIVA) run ascension()~
replicate caution replicate overheating replication destabilization imminent~ SUROS.
For Ghosts whose Guardians have stood against SIVA.
This sounds like it could be invaluable to Exodus colonists. But Malahayati has some concerns. ~SIVA.MEM.CL009
"The dead come for these, but the dead should not have them." —Crumpled note pinned in the clasp
Well, SIVA requires no external power source, so…forever. ~SIVA.MEM.WB007
General, poorly worded or malicious code is the fault of the programmer, not SIVA itself. ~SIVA.MEM.WB010
You are the calm eye of the dire storm.
"SIVA destroyed the Iron Lords, but history need not repeat itself. Use it if you must. Even the most destructive tool, in the end, is a tool." —Tyra Karn
"Our weapons were keen, our Sparrows nimble, our laughter loud and bold." —Lord Saladin
The sound of beautiful destruction.
"Not Eliksni, no… but true Kell and Queen. House Judgment honors her." —Variks
Equip this shader to change the color of your armor.
Oryx is dead, right?

items.itemDescription: Forge the fury of undying suns.
How to count the infinities?
Eirene ~If (SIVA) return replicate // else if (!SIVA) run ascension()~
Diluvian 10/4x: Tossed upon the seas of war and ~SIVA
For Ghosts who are always chasing the next challenge.
"A sacrifice is required." —Parables of the Allspring
Doctor Bray, I'm sure you've realized SIVA's applications extend beyond colonization. ~SIVA.MEM.CL011
"One day the Last City will be known as the First City."
"When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song
The Exodus program would be interested in exploring SIVA's defensive applications. ~SIVA.MEM.CL013
"Be cautious with the SIVA you find. This all started because we unleashed what we shouldn't have." —Lord Saladin
Many are brave, but only the strong and the living will ever ride this Sparrow.
Blow your own horn.
The old blood of Murmansk.

It's a smash hit!

items.itemDescription: Draw from the Void. Light the way.
"Just… Come on. Just don't."
Pryderi-D: Long will ~replicate replicate replicate replicate replicate rep
"If only...if only we had heeded the Queen..."
For Ghosts who profess allegiance to the Future War Cult.
SIVA doesn't expire, degrade, or forget. It can remain dormant even on long voyages. ~SIVA.MEM.WB004
"When the tainted grail o'erflowed again, who answered?" —The New-Forged Song
We've found a way to push our matter encryption technology even further. ~SIVA.MEM.WB002
"When the Iron Temple's fires were lit again, who came to stand before its hearth?" —The New-Forged Song
Habitats, equipment, repairs of all kinds—all of these things can be made from one material. ~SIVA.MEM.WB003
"It was inevitable Guardians would grab SIVA from off the field. Let's see what they do with it." —Shiro-4
It takes a skilled field mechanic to disable limiters without destabilizing the entire drive.
Blow your own horn.
You fly unbound beneath eternity.
